### üöÄ Quick Install

```bash
# Core package (required)
npm install @tokiforge/core@^{VERSION}

# Framework adapters
npm install @tokiforge/react@^{VERSION}
npm install @tokiforge/vue@^{VERSION}
npm install @tokiforge/svelte@^{VERSION}
npm install @tokiforge/angular@^{VERSION}

# CLI tool
npm install -g tokiforge-cli@^{VERSION}
```
